translation.en: [woman] There is no city on God's green earth that rocks harder than Chicago, Illinois.
translation.es: No hay ciudad en la tierra de Dios que sea más genial que Chicago, Illinois.

translation.en: The legends from this city are so badass,
translation.es: Las leyendas de esta ciudad son tan increíbles,

translation.en: they only need one name:
And me, Diane.
You know how they call Chicago the city of broad shoulders?
translation.es: ¿Vieron cómo le dicen a Chicago la ciudad trabajadora?

translation.en: Well, I'm the broad.
Just like me, this city has been through some shit,
translation.es: Como yo, esta ciudad tuvo que soportar mierdas,

translation.en: but it always finds a way to bounce back, baby.
translation.es: pero siempre encuentra la forma de recuperarse, cariño.

translation.en: Like in 1871,
when the whole damn place burned to the ground.
translation.es: cuando todo el maldito lugar se quemó.

translation.en: We didn't cry about it.
We built that bitch right back up.
Then there was Prohibition.
When the country said you can't drink,
we said, "Eff dat. Make it a double."
translation.es: nos cagamos en todo y pedimos un doble.

translation.en: 'Cause in Chicago… [gulps]
…we do things big, baby.
translation.es: tiramos la casa por la ventana, cariño.

translation.en: In fact, Chicago does things so big,
our parties are whole frickin' neighborhoods,
translation.es: que nuestras fiestas son barrios enteros,

translation.en: and I live in the best one: Wrigleyville.
translation.es: y yo vivo en el mejor: Wrigleyville.

translation.en: Where you can let your hair down, and when you gotta yak,
translation.es: Donde puedes soltarte el cabello y cuando vomites,

translation.en: there's always someone to hold it back for ya.
Me! And I'm gonna party my tits off!
[people chanting] Diane! Diane!
Diane! Diane!
-[man] Diane! Diane! -Diane! Diane!
[man] Diane! Diane!
-[Diane snores] -Wake up!
[yelps] Damn it, Kurt, you woke me up mid-party dream.
translation.es: Maldición, Kurt, me despertaste en medio de una fiesta.

translation.en: That's dangerous.
Jesus, Di. I don't know what you got into last night,
translation.es: Cielos, Di. No sé qué hiciste anoche,

translation.en: but you came home and drank the bottle of brandy
translation.es: pero viniste a casa y bebiste la botella de brandy

translation.en: my dad had with him on D-Day.
translation.es: que mi papá tenía consigo el día D.

translation.en: Then you forgot to close the window after you had a smoke,
translation.es: Luego olvidaste cerrar la ventana después de fumar,

translation.en: and Butkus almost fell out.
You're not even supposed to have that as a pet.
translation.es: No deberías tener eso como mascota.

translation.en: He was in the Reptile Lost and Found.
translation.es: Estaba en la zona de Perdido y Encontrado.

translation.en: Poor guy had 18 condoms of heroin in his little belly.
translation.es: El pobre tenía 18 condones de heroína en su pancita.

translation.en: Big whoop, we've all been to Mexico.
translation.es: Pues, todos hemos estado en México.

translation.en: Why are you so angry today? You havin' a 'roid flare-up?
translation.es: ¿Por qué estás tan enojado hoy? ¿Estás nervioso?

translation.en: Diane, yesterday was our anniversary.
Uh, no doy.
That's why I got you…
Al's Beef!
You ate it all.
There's a couple of fries in the bag.
translation.es: Hay un par de papas fritas ahí.

translation.en: I don't want bag fries.
I want my wife to remember the anniversary of the second time we got married.
translation.es: Quiero que recuerdes el aniversario de la segunda vez que nos casamos.

translation.en: Diane, I'm getting too old to live like this.
translation.es: Diane, estoy envejeciendo para vivir así.

translation.en: Based on my family history and cholesterol level,
translation.es: Si me baso en mi historia familiar y mi colesterol,

translation.en: I'm gonna die five years ago.
Come on, Kurt, we do this all the time.
translation.es: Vamos, Kurt, hacemos esto todo el tiempo.

translation.en: You get mad, say you're gonna leave,
translation.es: Te enojas, dices que te vas,

translation.en: then we angry 69, and it's all good.
translation.es: luego hacemos el 69 enojados y todo está bien.

translation.en: So let's unpack that duffel, grab some wet wipes, and--
translation.es: Guardemos ese bolso, agarremos toallitas húmedas y…

translation.en: Not this time. I'm done.
This isn't Jordan leaving in '93.
translation.es: Esto no es Jordan abandonando en el 93,

translation.en: It's Jordan leaving in '98.
Good luck doing better than this!
translation.es: ¡Buena suerte con que te vaya mejor!

translation.en: [Diane] Gettin' dumped is the worst way to start off a Monday.
translation.es: Que terminen contigo un lunes es un horror.

translation.en: Monday? Oh shit, it's Tuesday.
It's my nephew's birthday.
translation.es: Es el cumpleaños de mi sobrino.

translation.en: Happy birthday, sweetie. Whassup?
-Hi, Aunt Diane. -Say it.
-I can't talk. -Say it.
Whassup?
You're finally 18!
You know what I was doing when I was 18?
Jim Belushi. Ugh.
Played his goddamn harmonica the whole time.
translation.es: Tocó su armónica todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Aunt Diane, I can't really talk--
Hey, no phones during dodgeball.
Can I pick the janitor?
No, you gotta pick Daniel.
Thank you, Barack Obama.
Okay, love you, sweetie.
What the hell?
-[bell jingles] -Hey, where's Stavros?
I beg your pardon?
Little Greek guy, unibrow, owns the coffee place next door.
translation.es: El pequeño griego, uniceja, es dueño del café de al lado.

translation.en: Oh, we just bought that building.
Kreativ Jus is expanding.
By the way, I'm Feather, one of the wellness collaborators.
translation.es: Por cierto, soy Feather, uno de los colaboradores de bienestar.

translation.en: Yeah, hi. Where's your alkaline water? By the chia seeds.
translation.es: - Hola. ¿El agua alcalina? - Al lado de las semillas de chía.

translation.en: If you hit the celery milk, you've gone too far.
translation.es: Si llegas a la leche de apio, te pasaste.

translation.en: [chuckles] You know what I drink, sweetie?
Hose water, straight from Lake Michigan.
translation.es: Agua de manguera, directamente del lago Michigan.

translation.en: Lake Michigan has extremely high levels of E. coli.
translation.es: El lago Michigan tiene niveles extremadamente altos de E. coli.

translation.en: Don't be afraid of a little diarrhea, honey.
translation.es: No le tengas miedo a la diarrea, cariño.

translation.en: Keeps you slim. Not that you gotta worry about it.
translation.es: Te mantiene delgada. No es que debas preocuparte.

translation.en: Sweet Christ, you are tight.
Anyhoo, Feather,
give me an extra-large half coffee, half cream, half Splendas
translation.es: dame medio café extragrande, mitad crema, mitad endulzante

translation.en: with crushed-up Excedrin on the rim.
translation.es: con algo para las migrañas en el borde.

translation.en: It sounds like you're worried about inflammation.
translation.es: Parece que te preocupa la inflamación.

translation.en: Can I interest you in a CBD latte?
Reefer that don't get you high? Go scratch.
translation.es: ¿Porro que no te droga? No, gracias.

translation.en: Girls, stop what you're doin'.
I need a Diane day. Kurt left me.
translation.es: Necesito un día para mí. Kurt me dejó.

translation.en: No. The day after y'all anniversary?
translation.es: No. ¿El día después de su aniversario?

translation.en: I know. What a jagbag.
Don't you do the mutual oral sex?
-And then the fight is over, right? -Like I didn't try that, Zuzana.
translation.es: - Y luego la pelea termina, ¿no? - Como si no lo hubiera intentado, Zuzana.

translation.en: I'm canceling all my appointment.
Tina, get out your tarot cards. I need a reading.
translation.es: Tina, saca tus cartas del tarot. Necesito una lectura.

translation.en: Zuzs, take off your Crocs. You're walkin' on my back.
translation.es: Zuzs, quítate la Crocs. Caminarás sobre mi espalda.

translation.en: Anyway, we got a score?
-[static] -Oh shit, cable's out.
Zuzana, keep your Crocs on. You're goin' to the roof.
translation.es: Zuzana, déjate las Crocs. Irás al techo.

translation.en: Diane, Diane, the new manager said no more Cubs games at work.
translation.es: El nuevo encargado dijo que no podemos ver más juegos de los Cubs.

translation.en: Oh, the new manager.
You mean Mr. Fancy Pants from New York,
translation.es: ¿Te refieres a Pantalones Elegantes de Nueva York,

translation.en: with his skinny little pizzas and his big, fat bagels?
translation.es: con sus pizzas flacas y sus rosquillas grandes y gordas?

translation.en: Well, when New Dork Shitty gets here,
translation.es: Cuando llegue el idiota de Nueva York,

translation.en: I'm gonna remind him that this is Chi City Sports Cuts and Clips.
translation.es: le recordaré que esto es Cortes de Chicago Deportes.

translation.en: We were built on Chicago sports and the haircuts that defined 'em.
translation.es: Nos basamos en los deportes de Chicago y los cortes de pelo que los definían.

translation.en: And in this place, on that screen,
translation.es: Y en este lugar, en esa pantalla,

translation.en: when the Cubs are playin', we watch 'em fuckin' play.
translation.es: cuando los Cubs están jugando, los vemos jugar.

translation.en: Diane, Gideon, our new manager.
Just got in from, how did you put it, New Dork Shitty?
translation.es: Acabo de llegar de, ¿cómo me dijiste? ¿El idiota de Nueva York?

translation.en: Anyhoo, let's open up.
We did, 45 minutes ago.
Great. What'd I miss?
Well, I was telling Tina and Zuzana about the big renovation.
translation.es: Bueno, les contaba a Tina y Zuzana sobre la gran reforma.

translation.en: All these chairs? Gone.
The TVs will be showing silent music videos,
translation.es: Los televisores mostrarán videos de música mudos,

translation.en: and we'll be going cashless.
Okay, but just keep in mind,
we're pretty old school at Chi City Sports Cuts and Clips--
translation.es: somos de la vieja escuela en Cortes de Chicago Deportes…

translation.en: -Borough. -What's that?
The salon has been renamed Borough.
translation.es: El salón pasó a llamarse Borough.

translation.en: It is our first location outside of New York.
translation.es: Es nuestro primer local fuera de Nueva York.

translation.en: That is so great.
What a fun day full of extreme changes.
translation.es: Qué día tan divertido lleno de cambios extremos.

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me for a sec, I'm gonna hit the head.
translation.es: Ahora, si me disculpas por un segundo, debo ir al baño.

translation.en: -Give me the keys, motherfucker. -Please don't kill me! Take everything!
translation.es: - Dame las llaves, hijo de puta. - ¡No me mates!

translation.en: Here's my phone. Here's my wallet! -My PIN number's eight, four-- -[laughing]
translation.es: ¡Llévate todo! Mi teléfono, mi billetera. Mi número PIN es ocho, cuatro…

translation.en: Jesus, Diane. I do not like that.
translation.es: Por Dios, Diane. No me gusta eso.

translation.en: That's the risk you take coming into the big city, Mark.
translation.es: Ese es el riesgo que corres al venir a la gran ciudad, Mark.

translation.en: -[laughs] She got you, Dad. -There's the birthday boy!
translation.es: Te asustó, papá. ¡Ahí está el cumpleañero!

translation.en: Oh, I got you a present.
Tip it back. His boxers come off so you can see what Dave's packin'--
translation.es: Inclínala. Se le baja el bóxer para que puedas ver cómo tiene el…

translation.en: Diane, he's 18.
-I know. He can legally drink. -That's not--
translation.es: - Lo sé. Puede beber legalmente. - Eso no es…

translation.en: This is actually apropos, Aunt Diane.
We're going to the Art Institute to see Hannah Black's video installation.
translation.es: Iremos al Instituto de Arte a ver la instalación de video de Hannah Black.

translation.en: It's a reimagining of all the Renaissance Masters.
translation.es: Es una reinvención de todos los Maestros del Renacimiento.

translation.en: But first, lunch at the Palmer House.
translation.es: Pero primero, almuerzo en el Palmer House.

translation.en: [verbalizing foghorn] Sucks.
Speakin' of which, where's my sister?
Oh, um, she's-- Uh--
Well, what's goin' on with you, Diane?
Your hair looks… consistent.
Mark, I know when you're hiding something 'cause your milky skin gets pink.
translation.es: Mark, sé que escondes algo porque tu piel lechosa se pone rosa.

translation.en: -Okay, she's upstairs. -Mwah!
Well, if it isn't the Wicked Witch of the North Shore.
translation.es: Pues, si es la bruja malvada de la costa oeste.

translation.en: To what do I owe the pleasure?
We'll be in touch.
If you're thinkin' about rentin' out the second room, Bonnie, you gotta tell me.
translation.es: Si piensas alquilar la segunda habitación, dímelo.

translation.en: I keep my wet clothes in there.
She's not moving in.
She stages apartments.
Diane, look, you know Daniel got into Stanford, right?
I know. And I hope my recommendation letter helped.
translation.es: Lo sé. Y espero que mi carta de recomendación haya ayudado.

translation.en: Yeah.
Besides being one of the most elite universities in the world,
translation.es: Además de ser una de las universidades más selectas del mundo,

translation.en: it's also incredibly expensive.
So Mark and I have to offload some of our assets.
translation.es: Así que Mark y yo tenemos que deshacernos de algunos bienes.

translation.en: English, please.
Oh my God, I'm selling the condo.
So I'm gonna have a new landlord?
You have to move out, Diane.
[gasps] What? How could you do this to me?
After all the work I put into this place?
translation.es: ¿Después de todo el trabajo que hice aquí?

translation.en: The Van Halen Fatheads,
that poster of the Fridge on the fridge…
translation.es: ese póster de The Fridge, en el refrigerador…

translation.en: Maybe this'll be good for you.
translation.es: Esto puede ser bueno para ti.

translation.en: It could be the kick in the pants you need.
translation.es: Quizás es la motivación que necesitas.

translation.en: What the hell does that mean?
I mean, don't you think it's time for you to reevaluate?
translation.es: Digo, ¿no crees que es hora de que vuelvas a ver dónde estás?

translation.en: Wait, where is the dishwasher?
I upgraded it to a kegerator.
translation.es: Lo cambié por un expendedor de cerveza.

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -Oh. I can't get into this right now.
translation.es: No puedo lidiar con esto ahora.

translation.en: A homeless person just walked past the car, and Mark is nervous.
translation.es: Una persona sin techo pasó por el auto y Mark está nervioso.

translation.en: A homeless person?
You mean, like what you just made me?
translation.es: ¿Como lo que me acabas de hacer?

translation.en: You have one week.
Oh, that's plenty of time.
I've gotten pregnant and un-pregnant in one week!
translation.es: ¡Me he embarazado y abortado en una semana!

translation.en: I am just fine, baby!
[Diane] So Kurt's gone, job is rocky,
translation.es: Kurt se fue, el trabajo está difícil,

translation.en: and the apartment situation ain't lookin' good.
translation.es: y la situación del apartamento no se ve bien.

translation.en: That's a three-peat but in a bad way.
translation.es: Son tres puntos, pero no de los buenos.

translation.en: Luckily, I can always count on my baby boy, Mikey.
translation.es: Por suerte, siempre puedo contar con mi bebé, Mikey.

translation.en: Hi, Mikey!
Most mothers would be horrified if their son just got hit in the face
translation.es: Muchas madres se horrorizarían si su hijo fuera golpeado en la cara con un Samsonite de 25 kilos,

translation.en: with a 48-pound Samsonite,
translation.es: en la cara con un Samsonite de 25 kilos,

translation.en: but my Mikey has the skull of a ram.
translation.es: pero mi Mikey tiene el cráneo de un carnero.

translation.en: He's been hit in the head at every single Chicago sporting event.
translation.es: Lo golpearon en la cabeza en cada evento deportivo de Chicago.

translation.en: That huge, hard melon is why he's my only kid.
translation.es: Ese melón enorme y duro es la razón de que sea mi único hijo.

translation.en: Tore me apart comin' out.
translation.es: Me partió al medio al salir.

translation.en: -[grunts] -Hi, baby. I brought you rib tips.
Ma, I'm super busy.
Southwest keeps addin' these "wanna get aways,"
and all the bags fly free.
translation.es: y todas las maletas van gratis.

translation.en: You know what would help? If I moved in with you for a bit.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué ayudaría? Si me mudo contigo un tiempo.

translation.en: I could cook you breakfast gyros.
I'm sorry, Ma.
Dad already took the Murphy bed in the garage.
translation.es: Papá ya está en la cama Murphy en el garaje.

translation.en: That slippery motherfucker.
I can't believe he would stoop to askin' his own child to bail him out.
translation.es: No puedo creer que se atreviera a pedirle a su propio hijo que lo ayude.

translation.en: What about the shed in back?
I would never let my mother live in a frickin' shed.
translation.es: Jamás dejaría que vivas en un maldito cobertizo.

translation.en: Besides, my buddy Anton's living there until his wife gets out of jail.
translation.es: Además, mi amigo Anton vive ahí hasta que su esposa salga de la cárcel.

translation.en: You know what? You're right. I'm better than a shed.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Tienes razón. Estoy mejor que para un cobertizo.

translation.en: I should upgrade a little.
I love you, honey.
And remember, always lift with your back.
translation.es: Y recuerda, siempre levanta con la espalda.

translation.en: [grunts] Goddamn it! That is for sure over 50 pounds.
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea! Eso es más de 25 kilos.

translation.en: So I'd like somewhere with a pool. Above ground is preferred.
translation.es: Necesito un lugar con piscina, sobre el suelo, preferentemente,

translation.en: And I need a three-car garage
translation.es: y necesito un garaje bien grande

translation.en: 'cause I gotta park my Camaro horizontally.
translation.es: porque debo estacionar mi Camaro a lo largo.

translation.en: Okay, that's a lot of amenities.
-[laptop chimes] -Oh, your credit report just came in.
translation.es: Acaba de entrar tu informe financiero.

translation.en: -I don't think I can help you. -Why? What is it?
translation.es: - No creo que pueda ayudarte. - ¿Por qué? ¿Qué pasa?

translation.en: Negative 70.
Ah! It went up.
Maybe we need to reassess your criteria.
That's fine. I'm super flex.
If it's an in-ground pool, I'll deal.
translation.es: Si es una piscina enterrada, lo acepto.

translation.en: I gotta run to work. I believe in you…
translation.es: Debo ir a trabajar. Confío en ti…

translation.en: -Carl. -Carl.
The cut looks great, honey.
translation.es: El corte se ve genial, cariño.

translation.en: Very Dennis Franz.
That'll be… 36 dollars?
Jesus, what a rip!
But totally worth it.
Do you take Apple Pay?
[laughs] Yeah, sure. One bushel of apples ought to do it.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Varias manzanas podrían pagarlo.

translation.en: Seriously, just scan my phone.
Ah, shit. Let me figure out this goddamn nerd pad.
translation.es: Mierda, déjame resolver este maldito dispositivo.

translation.en: -Oops. Wrong button. Maybe this-- -[thrash metal playing]
Okay, now that we've sanitized the perineum,
let's remove this ingrown hair.
Diane, turn this off.
-Shit. Sorry. Hold on. -[thrash metal cycles on and off]
And why are you watchin' this at work?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué miras esto en el trabajo?

translation.en: You said I couldn't watch the Cubs.
translation.es: Dijiste que no podía ver a los Cubs.

translation.en: Turn it off, now.
Got it. So you hit "off."
Diane, you haven't had a client in your chair for two days,
translation.es: Diane, hace dos días que no tienes un cliente en tu silla,

translation.en: so I put you at the front counter, and somehow, that was worse.
translation.es: y al ponerte en el mostrador fue peor.

translation.en: So back to the chair?
Diane, to be honest, I don't know where I can put you.
translation.es: Diane, para ser honesto, no sé dónde puedo ponerte.

translation.en: Maybe you just don't fit in here.
Oh, I see what's goin' on.
Well, that's too bad.
'Cause I really wanted to fit in here at Borough
'cause this place rocks.
Psych.
[Diane] Now, when a white person tells you they're from Chicago,
translation.es: Cuando una persona blanca te dice que es de Chicago,

translation.en: they're actually most likely from a suburb,
translation.es: lo más probable es que sean de un suburbio,

translation.en: like where my sister Bonnie lives.
translation.es: como donde vive mi hermana Bonnie.

translation.en: Hey. I'm talking to my Stanford roommate. Mom's in the kitchen.
translation.es: Hola. Hablo con mi compañero de Stanford. Mamá está en la cocina.

translation.en: Here, sweetie, kill this for me.
Oh, I don't want this.
Hi. Place looks great. Love the curtains and shit.
translation.es: Hola. El lugar se ve genial. Me encantan las cortinas.

translation.en: Listen, I gotta talk to you, in private.
translation.es: Escucha, debo hablar contigo en privado.

translation.en: Anything you say to me, you can say in front of Mark.
translation.es: Lo que quieras decir, puedes decirlo frente a Mark.

translation.en: Okay. Hey, I can't stop queefing.
translation.es: Bien. No puedo dejar de tirarme pedos vaginales.

translation.en: I'm gonna go charge the leaf blower.
translation.es: Voy a cargar el soplador de hojas.

translation.en: Anyhooters, whaddya think about giving me an extension on the apartment?
translation.es: ¿Qué piensas de darme una extensión del apartamento?

translation.en: Two, maybe three years.
Gotta get my freakin' ducks in a barrel.
Absolutely not.
[sighs] I thought it might come to this.
This is an Uno's Pizzeria platinum gold card.
translation.es: Esta es una tarjeta dorada Platino de Uno's Pizzería.

translation.en: It entitles the cardholder to free unlimited deep dish pizza for life.
translation.es: Le da derecho al titular de pizza al molde gratis de por vida.

translation.en: I won it in a thong contest on Mancow's Morning Madhouse.
translation.es: Lo gané en un concurso de tangas en el show radal de Mancow's.

translation.en: Obviously, the value of the card far exceeds the price of the rent,
translation.es: Obviamente, el valor de la tarjeta excede el precio del alquiler,

translation.en: so we're gonna have to prorate the difference.
translation.es: así que debemos prorratear la diferencia.

translation.en: Wow, what a reasonable trade-off.
I rescind my offer.
Actually, while you're here, I do need you to sign this.
translation.es: De hecho, mientras estás aquí, firma esto.

translation.en: It just says that you will vacate the condo on the agreed-upon date.
translation.es: Dice que dejarás el apartamento en la fecha acordada.

translation.en: Feel free to have your lawyer look it over.
translation.es: Haz que tu abogado lo revise.

translation.en: Oh, sure. Yeah, I'll just run it by my lawyer.
translation.es: Claro. Sí, se lo daré a mi abogado.

translation.en: And my stockbroker and my dentist.
translation.es: Y a mi corredor de bolsa y mi dentista.

translation.en: Come on, Bonnie, you know I can't afford those luxuries.
translation.es: Vamos, Bonnie, sabes que no puedo pagar esos lujos.

translation.en: Not everyone married a trust-fund baby.
translation.es: No todas se casaron con un millonario.

translation.en: Stop saying everyone who has a steady job is a trust-fund baby.
translation.es: Deja de decir que todos los que tienen un trabajo estable son millonarios.

translation.en: I'm not signing your stupid papers.
And to think, I almost gave you free deep dish for life.
translation.es: Y pensar que casi te doy pizza al molde gratis de por vida.

translation.en: Unlimited toppings, up to three. No premium meats.
translation.es: Ingredientes ilimitados, hasta tres. Nada de carnes de primera.

translation.en: Not available on weekend nights. Void where prohibited--
translation.es: No disponible los fines de semana. Nulo si se prohíbe…

translation.en: Diane, go home.
You hungry, kiddo?
My roommate's name is Thorn.
He's on a water polo scholarship,
and he says his girlfriend will be sleeping over a lot.
translation.es: y dice que su novia se quedará mucho a dormir.

translation.en: I shouldn't complain.
Stanford is one of the elite universities in the world.
translation.es: Stanford es una de las universidades de élite del mundo.

translation.en: You sound like your frickin' mom.
What are you really feeling?
Okay, I'll go first.
I know when you look at me, you think, "Damn, my aunt's got her shit together."
translation.es: Sé que cuando me miras piensas: "Vaya, mi tía lo tiene todo solucionado":

translation.en: But if I'm being honest,
I'm kind of in a rebuilding year, and I don't know what's next for me.
translation.es: estoy en un año de reconstrucción y no sé qué hay para mí.

translation.en: Now, you go.
[sighs] Well, I think I got so caught up in everybody wanting me to go to Stanford,
translation.es: Me sentí tan presionado con que todos quisieran que vaya a Stanford,

translation.en: I never asked myself if I wanted to go there.
translation.es: que nunca me pregunté si quería ir allí.

translation.en: I felt the same way
when I went to Medieval Times for my third bachelorette party.
translation.es: cuando fui a Medieval Times para mi tercera despedida de soltera.

translation.en: Did you know all that shit's fake?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que toda esa mierda es falsa?

translation.en: Yeah, we kept telling you.
[sighs] Why am I gonna move 2,000 miles away to find myself,
translation.es: ¿Por qué me mudaría a 3000 km para encontrarme

translation.en: when I don't even know who I am here?
translation.es: cuando ni siquiera sé quién soy aquí?

translation.en: I know who you are. You're my amazing nephew.
translation.es: Sé quién eres. Eres mi sobrino increíble.

translation.en: You're cool and kind and talented. Hello!
translation.es: Eres genial, amable y talentoso. ¿Qué más?

translation.en: With all your art stuff?
You're gonna be aces no matter where you end up.
translation.es: Lo harás increíble sin importar dónde termines.

translation.en: You really like my artwork?
It's incredible, Daniel.
And I think art sucks.
translation.es: Y creo que el arte apesta.

translation.en: -[jaunty ring tone plays] -Oh, it's my Realtor. Go for Diane.
translation.es: Es mi agente inmobiliario. Aquí, Diane.

translation.en: Hello, Diane, great news.
Found a place, and it's in your price range.
translation.es: Encontré un lugar que puedes pagar.

translation.en: Sweet Ditka's dick.
See, Daniel? Things do work out.
What neighborhood is it in?
Pilsen? Back of the Yards? Uptown? Downtown?
Logan Square? Lincoln Square? Lincoln Park? Garfield Park?
Morgan Park? Hyde Park? Would love a park.
translation.es: ¿Morgan Park? ¿Hyde Park? Me encantaría un parque.

translation.en: It's in Hammond.
Hammond? But that's in…
[low-pitched and distorted] Indiana.
No!
Maybe Indiana isn't that bad.
translation.es: Quizá Indiana no sea tan malo.

translation.en: Are you kiddin' me?
I'm gonna move to that shithole and become one of those invisible women
translation.es: Me mudaré a esa mierda y me convertiré en una mujer invisible

translation.en: who eat Stouffer's creamed spinach soufflé by herself every night,
translation.es: que come crepes congelados y suflé de espinaca todas las noches,

translation.en: until one day her cats turn on her and boom! I'm frickin' dead.
translation.es: hasta que un día uno de sus gatos se da cuenta de que está muerta.

translation.en: And I'll never see you again because I'll be stuck in California
translation.es: Y nunca volveré a verte porque estaré atrapado en California

translation.en: listening to Thorn not satisfying his girlfriend.
translation.es: escuchando a Thorn no satisfacer a su novia.

translation.en: You know what?
You're leavin'. I'm leavin'. Fuck it.
translation.es: Tú te vas, yo me voy…

translation.en: Let's have the rager to end all ragers.
translation.es: Al carajo. Hagamos una última fiesta.

translation.en: One last chance for us to jam out with our clams out.
translation.es: Una última oportunidad para usar nuestras almejas.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't see how clam-jamming would fix this.
translation.es: Sí, no veo cómo las almejas arreglaría esto.

translation.en: It won't. This world is filled with shit that we can't control.
translation.es: No lo hará. Este mundo está lleno de cosas que no podemos controlar.

translation.en: Your husband leaves, you get a jagbag of a boss,
translation.es: Tu esposo se va, tienes un jefe de mierda,

translation.en: your whore sister kicks you out.
-Please don't call my mother that. -Daniel, it's like I always say.
translation.es: - No llames así a mi madre. - Daniel, es como siempre digo.

translation.en: When life gives you lemons,
translation.es: Cuando la vida te da limones,

translation.en: you turn that shit into Mike's Hard Lemonade.
translation.es: conviertes esa mierda en limonada con alcohol.

translation.en: [singer] Whoo!
translation.es: VEN A LA GRAN FIESTA DE DIANE. SERÁ GENIAL.

translation.en: Thanks for comin', sweetie.
Ooh, I'll take a hit of that.
Fuck Green Bay!
Bottoms up.
[inhales] My girls!
God bless you two. I'm gonna miss you both so much.
translation.es: Dios las bendiga. Las extrañaré mucho.

translation.en: It won't be the same without you.
translation.es: No será lo mismo sin ti.

translation.en: It'll be less loud, less smoky, and less fun.
translation.es: Será menos ruidoso, con menos humo y menos divertido.

translation.en: [laughs] You said it.
Scottie Pippen. Ya made it.
You told me the other Bulls would be here.
translation.es: Me dijiste que los otros Bulls vendrían.

translation.en: I did. I did say that.
Find me later. I'm single again.
translation.es: Búscame más tarde. Estoy soltera otra vez.

translation.en: We can play "Just the Tip in with Pippen."
translation.es: Podemos jugar a "Solo la puntita con Pippen".

translation.en: I know, right?
There he is. My handsome nephew.
What I wouldn't give to be 18 again and living down in the city.
translation.es: Lo que daría por tener 18 años y vivir en la ciudad.

translation.en: Well, actually, I'm going to coll--
Whoa-whoa-whoa, Styx. Hold up, boys.
Can I get everyone's attention?
Tonight, we are celebratin' the end of an era.
translation.es: Esta noche celebramos el fin de una era.

translation.en: As some of you may know,
this'll be the last rager thrown at this address.
translation.es: esta será la última fiesta en esta dirección.

translation.en: -What? -No way.
Where are the other Bulls?
But more importantly,
we are also here to celebrate the start of a new era.
translation.es: estamos aquí para celebrar el comienzo de una nueva era.

translation.en: I'd like to give a toast to my nephew.
Daniel Whiddington, get your juicy little fanny up here.
translation.es: Daniel Whiddington, trae tu jugoso trasero aquí.

translation.en: This is the best night of my life!
translation.es: ¡Esta es la mejor noche de mi vida!

translation.en: It's a miracle he turned out so good,
translation.es: Es un milagro que haya salido tan bien,

translation.en: 'cause his dad is a pussy and his mom is a dick.
translation.es: porque su papá es un cobarde y su mamá es un imbécil.

translation.en: What da fuck?
-Mom? -Bonnie?
Put that goddamn beer stein down.
translation.es: Baja esa maldita jarra de cerveza.

translation.en: Oh, no, her Chicago accent's out.
translation.es: No, ese es su acento de Chicago.

translation.en: -Did you tell her about the party? -No.
I tracked his phone, and I saw he was here.
translation.es: Rastreé su teléfono y vi que estaba aquí.

translation.en: That's an invasion of my privacy.
You, get your things.
You, fire escape, now.
Everything's okay.
Party's still on.
Styx, play "Come Sail Away."
Listen, Bonnie--
I should call the cops on you for getting my underage son drunk.
translation.es: Debería llamar a la policía porque emborrachaste a mi hijo.

translation.en: The cops? Who do you think brought the nitrous?
translation.es: ¿La policía? ¿Quién crees que trajo el gas de la risa?

translation.en: Look at you.
You're chasing a party that ended 20 years ago.
translation.es: Sigues detrás de una fiesta que terminó hace 20 años.

translation.en: Why do you think Mom and Dad moved to Arizona?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que mamá y papá están en Arizona?

translation.en: Because the dry air is good for Dad's gout.
translation.es: Porque el aire seco es bueno para la gota de papá.

translation.en: No, it was to get away from you.
translation.es: No, se fueron para alejarse de ti.

translation.en: You're just like Chicago,
a huge mess whose best days are behind you.
translation.es: un gran desastre cuyos mejores días ya terminaron.

translation.en: I am just like Chicago!
Yeah, we ain't perfect.
The South Side is very screwed up.
translation.es: El lado sur está muy jodido.

translation.en: North Side, a little better.
A lot of work and money has been put into it. That makes sense.
translation.es: Se ha invertido mucho trabajo y dinero. Eso tiene sentido.

translation.en: At least I don't worry about what everyone thinks
translation.es: Al menos no me preocupo por lo que todos piensan

translation.en: and pretend to be somethin' I'm not,
translation.es: y finjo ser algo que no soy,

translation.en: which is exactly what you're doin' to Daniel.
translation.es: que es exactamente lo que le estás haciendo a Daniel.

translation.en: Well, guess what? He's goin' to college.
So worry about your own degenerate ass.
translation.es: Así que preocúpate por tu trasero degenerado.

translation.en: Don't talk to her like that way.
Daniel, you're drunk. Go downstairs and get in the car.
translation.es: Daniel, estás borracho. Ve y sube al auto.

translation.en: You're not the boss of me anymore.
Get in the goddamn car.
Okay.
Nine a.m. tomorrow, you're out.
translation.es: Mañana a las nueve, te vas.

translation.en: And clean this fucking place up.
Daniel, you okay?
Is this how Aunt Diane feels every morning?
translation.es: ¿Así se siente la tía Diane todas las mañanas?

translation.en: Yes, it is. And it's very sad.
translation.es: Así es. Y es muy triste.

translation.en: Ugh. This is all because of her.
It is because of her.
Mom, we need to talk…
…in ten minutes.
Hey.
Hey.
I put the dishwasher back in.
[Bonnie] I see.
It's upside down, but I appreciate the effort.
translation.es: Está al revés, pero agradezco el esfuerzo.

translation.en: I signed those forms you asked for.
translation.es: Firmé los formularios que me pediste.

translation.en: Oh, you didn't sign it Tits McGee.
Nah, I used my real name.
You were right, Bon. I need to reevaluate.
Anyhoo, Indiana's a short drive--
translation.es: De todos modos, Indiana está a un viaje…

translation.en: Diane, stop.
I don't know what happened here last night,
but Daniel has decided he doesn't want to go to Stanford at this time.
translation.es: pero Daniel decidió que no quiere ir a Stanford ahora.

translation.en: Oh shit. You must be so pissed.
I am.
I-- I was. But I thought about it,
and I've never seen him so happy and confident.
translation.es: y nunca lo había visto tan feliz, seguro

translation.en: And hungover.
But as Brené Brown says, when your child is happy, you need to support them.
translation.es: Pero como dice Brené Brown, cuando tu hijo es feliz, debes apoyarlo.

translation.en: Tits up, tits out. What are you gonna do?
translation.es: Tetas del bien o del mal. ¿Qué harás?

translation.en: I'll tell you what you're gonna do. You're gonna let him live here with you
translation.es: Te diré lo que harás. Lo dejarás vivir contigo mientras se toma un año para resolver las cosas.

translation.en: while he takes a year to figure things out.
translation.es: Lo dejarás vivir contigo mientras se toma un año para resolver las cosas.

translation.en: Whatever that means.
Go scratch. Does that mean--
We're not selling the place. Yet.
Whassup?
-Whassup? -Whassup?
Whassup?
-Whassup? -Whassup?
Stop! Daniel, you don't even know what that's from.
translation.es: ¡Alto! Daniel, ni siquiera sabes de dónde viene eso.

translation.en: Let's celebrate. First round on me!
Oh shit, I don't have a job.
Actually, I might have an idea.
She's back.
Did you come back here to pick up the beer bong you left behind?
translation.es: ¿Viniste a buscar el bong de cerveza que dejaste?

translation.en: Nope, I came in to cut hair.
translation.es: No, vine a cortar el pelo.

translation.en: Turns out a party invite is a great way to make a client list.
translation.es: Una invitación a una fiesta termina siendo una lista de clientes.

translation.en: Whaddya think, Gideon?
Chair three.
-[thrash metal playing] -Oh, my bad!
